document_data.mainbody:
he Sea Maidens Faire was a traveling carnival of entertainers hailing from the city of Luskan in the late 15 century DR.
Traveling the Sword Coast in their three ships—the Heartbreaker, Hellraiser, and Eyecatcher, the Sea Maidens Faire performed shows and parades in towns up and down the coast.
The fleet was commanded by Captain Zardoz Zord.
In the , the Heartbreaker and Hellraiser were docked in Waterdeeps Dock Ward, with the Sea Maidens Faire carnival erected on the pier between the two ships. The flagship Eyecatcher was anchored in the harbor.
